headline: 3 Healthcare Stocks Skating on Thin Ice
summary: Personal health and wellness is one of the many secular tailwinds for healthcare companies. But near-term speed bumps have persisted in the wake of COVID-19 as players destocked inventories in 2023 and 2024. This has capped returns as the industry’s six-month gain of 1.2% has lagged the S&P 500’s 12.8% climb.
